Difficulty Notes: Optimizing the number of resources obtained in X number of actions
Question: What is the maximum guaranteed number of victory points the player could have after 2 more actions. Assume all other players have passed. Output the answer as: Previous amount: <num>, New amount: <num>
Rationale: Player can purchase one of the two face-up monument cards. For the second action, they don't have anything that would let them gain more VPs as they can't afford to obtain any new cards with victory points on them.
